ygData.subject: Re: Necromancer's fight with Mobster
ygData.msgSnippet: Necromancer keeps his rifle aimed at Shockaract, Then get them and leave, the Maximals have wounded to attend to. He didn t stay around the CF but still knew

Subject: Re: Necromancer's fight with Mobster
Date: Sat, 13 Jan 2001 09:58:34 -0800
Organization: Prodigy Internet
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

X-MSMail-Priority: Normal

X-Mimeole: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V5.00.2615.200
From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Necromancer keeps his rifle aimed at Shockaract, "Then get them and leave,
the Maximals have wounded to attend to." He didn't stay around the CF but
still knew his responsibility was to the injured Maximals over any ceasefire
that existed. What good would collecting wounded be if the other side knew
just how hurt they were.


----- Original Message -----
From: SOULSTICE <thecode@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, January 12, 2001 8:10 PM
Subject: Re: Necromancer's fight with Mobster


> Shokaract: Yes, we will leave...as soon as the Alliance retrieve their
> prisoners we will leave, that is...
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <cyberwolf4@...>
> To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
> Sent: Friday, January 12, 2001 11:00 PM
> Subject: Re: Necromancer's fight with Mobster
>
>
> > Necromancer sneers at Shockaract aiming the tip of his gun at the tip
> > of the tanks gattling gun, "Iron Raptor trusts to easily." They were
> > close enough now for either one to hit the other. "I've seen to much
> > treachery from your kind to believe that a cease fire will ever be
> > honored. Now take your lackeys and leave or I WILL make sure that you
> > can't return to anywhere."
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "SOULSTICE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> > > Gigas fired at the fireballs and blasted them clear away.
> > >
> > > Gigas: I too, am an elemental...
> > >
> > > Kracken: Nice, Gigas, why didn't you do that sooner?
> > >
> > > Gigas: Didn't feel like it.
> > >
> > > Shokaract: Nice, yes. Now there's no more need for fighting.
> > >
> > > Shokaract aimed at Necromancer with his tank mode gattling gun.
> > >
> > > Shokaract: Iron Raptor called...for a cease of firing...
> > >
> > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > From: <cyberwolf4@p...>
> > > To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
> > > Sent: Friday, January 12, 2001 10:31 PM
> > > Subject: Re: Necromancer's fight with Mobster
> > >
> > >
> > > > Necromancer flew from side to side avoiding the missles. the horn
> > > > drills hit him sending him to the ground. the fireballs and
> > > > flamethrower posed no threat so Necromancer took the hits head
> > > > on. "When will you learn about using elemental attacks on an
> > > > elemental?" he raise his weapon and fired five fireballs. (One at
> > > > each.)
> > > >
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "SOULSTICE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> > > > > Horn Drill dodged the ice, he prided himself on dodging. Gigas
> > was
> > > > hit by
> > > > > the fireballs.
> > > > >
> > > > > Kracken: So be it.
> > > > >
> > > > > Kracken fired 2 missiles at Necromancer. Horn Drill fired 2
> > horn
> > > > drills
> > > > > (wahaha) at Necromancer. Gigas used the Exploder, a flurry of
> > > > fireballs, and
> > > > > hurled the exploding fireballs at Necromancer. Grenade fired his
> > > > > flamethrower at Necromancer. Beholder 2 fired 4 shots at
> > > > Necromancer...
> > > > >
> > > > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > > > From: <cyberwolf4@p...>
> > > > > To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
> > > > > Sent: Friday, January 12, 2001 9:43 PM
> > > > > Subject: Re: Necromancer's fight with Mobster
> > > > >
> > > > >
> > > > > > Necromancer looked on in satisfaction as Mobster seperated.
> > He
> > > > fired
> > > > > > three ice blasts at Horn drill, then switched the setting and
> > > > fired a
> > > > > > fireball at Gigas.
> > > > > >
> > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "SOULSTICE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> > > > > > > Mobster had seperated right before the blast was fired, so
> > it
> > > > > > sailed over
> > > > > > > the Mob's head not making a scratch.
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > Horn Drill: So...we won?
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > Kracken: I don't think so...not yet...
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > > > > > From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...>
> > > > > > > To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
> > > > > > > Sent: Friday, January 12, 2001 11:33 PM
> > > > > > > Subject: Re: Necromancer's fight with Mobster
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > Necromancer fealt the tail strike Mobster, he couldn't
> > see him
> > > > > > but the
> > > > > > > > attack let him know where his target was. he opened his
> > mouth
> > > > and
> > > > > > fired an
> > > > > > > > ice blast at Mobster. In order to keep his opponent from
> > > > > > targeting him he
> > > > > > > > transformed back to his robot mode and fired a laser
> > blast
> > > > into
> > > > > > the smoke
> > > > > > > at
> > > > > > > > the gestault.
> > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > > > > > > From: SOULSTICE <thecode@p...>
> > > > > > > > To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
> > > > > > > > Sent: Thursday, January 11, 2001 1:47 PM
> > > > > > > > Subject: Re: Necromancer's fight with Mobster
> > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > > Mobster couldn't see because of the smokescreen, so he
> > > > > > retracted his
> > > > > > > > blade.
> > > > > > > > > Mobster took a swing but found himself struck upside
> > the
> > > > head by
> > > > > > > > > Necromancer's tail. He was losing his patience...
> > > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > > > > > > > From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...>
> > > > > > > > > To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
> > > > > > > > > Sent: Thursday, January 11, 2001 10:15 AM
> > > > > > > > > Subject: Re: Necromancer's fight with Mobster
> > > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > > > Mobsters blade slashed across Necromancers shoulder
> > > > absorbing
> > > > > > a
> > > > > > > portion
> > > > > > > > of
> > > > > > > > > > his strength. Necromancer swung his other claw at the
> > > > wrist
> > > > > > holding
> > > > > > > the
> > > > > > > > > > sabre. he released a smokescreen from his nostrils to
> > > > blind
> > > > > > Mobsters
> > > > > > > > > optics.
> > > > > > > > > > The mighty dragon concluded his attack by swinging
> > his
> > > > tail
> > > > > > into the
> > > > > > > > smoke
> > > > > > > > > > at the distracted bot.
> > > > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > > > ----- Original Message -----

> > > > > > > > > > > Mobster laughed. Gigas took control and switched to
> > FIre
> > > > > > Gigas,
> > > > > > > mode.
> > > > > > > > (I
> > > > > > > > > > > didn't just make that up, in Secret of Mana there
> > is a
> > > > Fire
> > > > > > Gigas)
> > > > > > > The
> > > > > > > > > > fire
> > > > > > > > > > > did little damage.
> > > > > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > > > > Mobster: I master in element defense. MOON SABRE!
> > > > > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > > > > A yellow blade came from his wrist. It absorbed
> > energy
> > > > when
> > > > > > it
> > > > > > > touched
> > > > > > > > > an
> > > > > > > > > > > enemy. Mobster ran forward and swung it at

> > > > > > > > > > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > > > > > > > > > From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...>
> > > > > > > > > > > To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
> > > > > > > > > > > Sent: Wednesday, January 10, 2001 10:16 AM

> > > > > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > > > > > Necromancer screamed in pain as the flamethrower
> > > > struck
> > > > > > his head,
> > > > > > > he
> > > > > > > > > > > placed
> > > > > > > > > > > > his claws over his face trying to cover up the
> > pain,
> > > > > > flying back
> > > > > > > > about
> > > > > > > > > > > > thirty feet and came to a sudden stop.
> > > > > > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > > > > > "HAHAHAHAHAHAHA!" He mocked as he uncoveredhis
> > face to
> > > > > > show that
> > > > > > > no
> > > > > > > > > > damage
> > > > > > > > > > > > had been inflicted. "You're trying to hurt me
> > with
> > > > fire?"
> > > > > > the
> > > > > > > dragon
> > > > > > > > > had
> > > > > > > > > > a
> > > > > > > > > > > > grin ear to pointy ear, "I master the elements
> > and
> > > > you're
> > > > > > trying
> > > > > > > to
> > > > > > > > > hurt
> > > > > > > > > > > me
> > > > > > > > > > > > with fire!"  He couldn't help laughing at the
> > > > desperate
> > > > > > move his
> > > > > > > > > > opponent
> > > > > > > > > > > > had just made. "
> > > > > > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > > > > > Necromancers eyes began to glow, smoke rose from
> > his
> > > > > > nostrils.
> > > > > > > "Let
> > > > > > > > me
> > > > > > > > > > > show
> > > > > > > > > > > > you just how well I master it." The great dragon
> > > > opened
> > > > > > his mouth
> > > > > > > > and
> > > > > > > > > > > > launched an inferno of white flame at the
> > alliance
> > > > bot.
> > > > > > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > > > > >
